title: Implementing Light/Dark Mode Switcher
content: In this post, I explain how I implemented a light/dark mode switcher using JavaScript. The switcher allows users to toggle between light and dark themes, providing a personalized experience. I used CSS variables to define the color schemes and JavaScript to handle the toggle functionality.
author: Joshua John Danes

title: Dynamic Blog Section
content: This post describes how I added a dynamic blog section to my portfolio. The blog posts are stored in a JSON file and loaded using JavaScript. The content is displayed dynamically, making it easy to update the blog without changing the HTML.
author: Joshua John Danes
